content: Great game but no way to undo is a fatal flaw. There is little reason to not have a undo button during your turn. If you misclick on a move action you could have cost yourself the game. Another note, there is no deselect on your move action. If you select a unit you are forced to move it. Why?

Great game, good adaptation of the real board game, although maybe not as good as the one in steam. However, many of the achievements are broken, like winning with the different factions or achieving the highest tier on buildings. If that was fixed, this game for me would be 5 stars.

Can't play without Google Play Games app. Uninstalled immediately so I can't comment on the quality of the actual game. Making the game 100% dependant on another app which can be buggy makes it a 1 star game. Sorry.

Terrible asynchronous online matchmaking...Scythe is a great game and like other great games should allow people to create games and wait offline for them to begin when others join. It's an app for a cell phone after all...how long should you keep the same screen on your phone to create an asynchronous game?
You can't complete all of the achievements because they haven't released the expansion yet, but other than that it's a good way to play

I just purchased your game on Google Play, but you are insisting I install Play Games before I can play it. No other board game app insists on this. Ridiculous. I'd like a refund please. It is beyond the 15 minutes, or I'd have done it automatically. So how do I get my refund? REFUND REFUND REFUND REFUND REFUND. REFUND REFUND REFUND REFUND REFUND. GAME IS UNUSABLE. I WANT MY MONEY BACK!
Runs great and plays great. I love playing it, the only downside I've seen is the stories missing for the action cards
Love the app and game...just curious how to get the invaders from afar expansion...do you have that available??
Amazing

Beautiful version of one of my favorite boardgames. Unfortunately there are a few control issues during multiplayer that can really mess you up. Not having any sort of undo, even inside your turn, can easily loose you the game. Clicking a mm off on the screen, will lead you to an unintended move that you can't take back.
Annoying load screen freeze but other than that one of the best board games ever
So boring. Sucks the life out of me

Very nice art, pretty cool concept, but the little models on the board 1 have no colour and 2 move around and make it feel like a kids biard game than a fight. My biggest downer was the combats just abrupt, theres no battle really just victory or loss. No battle effects is kinda a downer :(
This is a good game. The AI is very strong, even in Easy. The biggest problem, though, is that the player board disappears. If they'd fix that, it would be awesome.
Great App! Helped me improve at the physical board game. Would love the Invaders from Afar to become available as expansion!
Great implementation, of a very interesting game, has undo that is realy nice, and the AI is good

Scythe is one of my favorite board games, and the app makes it so convenient to play. I was most impressed by how different the factions and boards are, yet end up quite balanced. The fantastic artwork also deserves special mention.

Poor implementation of a good game. Asynchronous online games are unplayable as all players need to be present to start the game which defeats the purpose of the mode. This combined with undersized UI buttons and a bland color palette make for a bad game.
Great rendition of the tabletop. However, when a player leaves, host does not have ability to kick player.

Severe flickering on brand new high-end Pixelbook Go, as mentioned in another review. I'll update this review when that gets fixed, but so far I haven't been able to play the actual game. UPDATE: As of the Oct. 12th update, the game now runs perfectly on my Pixelbook Go. Great game!
random start selector for factions, objectives, and player boards really sucks. also, who/when the ai chooses to attack is often laughable. otherwise, fairly well-done.
Game keeps exiting
I have really enjoyed this game:) the one update i would recommend is the ability to see how many times each quadrant can be upgraded. Other than that I have had a blast with it
*Update: Issue has been solved.* Highly recommend on here and on GOG. 5/5 STARS
replyContent: Hello, if you are logged on the same Google Play account on your tablet you shouldn't have to pay again. If you still encounter this issue or If you have more information about it, don't hesitate to contact us here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&l=en&contact=1

content: Samsung Galaxy S9 - app regularly locks on load screen requiring a system restart, but once I'm in it's great. The load screen issue had been resolved for weeks but has returned today. I'd forgotten how frustrating this is, but hopefully it will be fixed soon.
replyContent: Hey! Thank you for the review! Our team is working on this load screen issue ;)

content: Locks up during fist turn, repeatedly. Sent email got no response.. 0 stars Love the game on PC and table top
replyContent: Hello, we are deeply sorry about that. Could you please contact our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&l=en&contact=1

content: Good port of a great game. I'll give 5 stars once these are fixed: 1. Building bonuses don't work right (e.g. for Neighbor Tunnels, 1 building by 2 tunnels gives $4 instead of $2) 2. Can't know which 6 bottom row upgrades will be available. (E.g., if a mech costs me 4 metal now, what price can I get it down to? 3, 2, or 1?) 3. There's no Undo button for online play. One "mis-tap" can ruin your game. 4. For online play, there's no way to propose a game to a player who isn't currently online.
Online play is buggy.
replyContent: Hello, we are sorry about that. If you have more information about this issue, don't hesitate to contact us here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&l=en&contact=1

content: Works great at first. After I log in for multiplayer the game will not open on subsequent launches. I have to wipe all data to open the app again. And once again, after I log in for multiplayer the game gets stuck on the loading screen for subsequent launches.
replyContent: Hello, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Don't hesitate to contact our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&l=en&contact=1

content: Solid adaptation of an excellent board game.
replyContent: Thank you for the review!

content: You know, it's a good game but I'm going to have to rate it at a one star until they fix the go-back/reverse actions on the game. They're real hit and miss on what it will allow you to reverse even if no unknown info is revealed on your turn. Real amateur hour issue there that should have been fixed early on. Love the game guys but get this fixed now.
I love it! I'm really excited for any future expansions to be added!
replyContent: Glad to read that!

content: Love this game. The digital version has been great for virtual game nights.
replyContent: Hi! Thank you! Have good virtual game nights with Scythe :)

content: Hi I just installed the app and its frozen on loading screen Device : Samsung Galaxy S20 SM-G980F Android ver. 10 I had to manually grant (allow) storage permission to resolve the issue. I was not prompted to do so when I started the app

I am a big fan of Scythe tabletop game and fully loved the transition of the digital edition. Spot on! I hope the expansions will come out very soon for Android. Please hurry up!!! The only deficit is that I have unlocked all game achievements (including the hidden one) on Android but the final one "Teleporting back to homebase" (Complete all achievements) does not unlock. I have also emailed you about it. Kindly have a look into this matter. Thank you!
replyContent: Hi! The team is investigating this achievement issue! Thank you for the feedback!

content: Multiplayer not ready for prime time. Cannot invite friends that aren't also online. No "friends list" function. No undo button in multiplayer. Does not run on Galaxy Tab S2. Several updates later these issues still stand.
replyContent:
Hello,

We are sorry about that, 
Could you please contact our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&contact=1

content: One of the best board games ever and the app is amazing!! Can't wait for the expansion to become available.
replyContent: Hey! Thank you! Hope you'll continue to enjoy the game :)

content: I really love this game and the implementation is near perfect. Unfortunately the lack of an undo button in online multiplayer (even as an option for private games) is a serious issue when playing on a small device. It is too easy to accidentally moved a unit to a hex when attempting to click on a different unit.
replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your support, we took note of your suggestion about the undo button. The team will discuss it.

content: Super annoying bug right now where I have to clear data for the app to start. Fun game, looking forward to the expansion being available.
replyContent: Hello, we got a few reports about this issue, the team is investigating it, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

content: Just great implementation
replyContent: Thank you for the review!

content: There are bug issues with the loading screen. For a game where I need to open the app multiple times for my turn, it needs to be able to open. It stays stuck on the loading screen and occasionally gets to the main menu. Please fix it!
replyContent: Hi! We are aware of this issue and the team is already working on it, we are deeply sorry for the inconvenience.

content: I love this game, absolutely HATE HATE HATE this app. I have to uninstall and reinstall the game every few hours as it gets stuck permanently on the loading screen. It's hard to see details like what costs are associated with producing, and it's irritating you can't start a game in play and go mode without everyone online. Plus so many other disappointing aspects to it. Sad that this is a PAID app.
replyContent: Hi! The team would want to know more about your issue, could you please contact our support here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&contact=1

content: Great adaptation nice graphics and I'm glad that there's multiplayer option. Can't wait gor expansions :) I have 2 issues though: 1. Notifications sometimes are missing and if there is any, it dissapears without explicit dismiss. The 2. Is that it's really hard to check other other players' info during matches especially on smaller screens.
No more flickering after the last update. Glad I stuck it out and didn't ask for a refund. Thank you!

Great game, and good adaptation to the mobile. I have two complaints. 1) It is a bit hard to understand the faction mat and upgrades on it. 2) It is missing the ability to revert actions before ending the turn for online games. Since the screen is relatively small, it is easy to make mistakes during the action phase and there is no way to revert them. In Terra Mystica for instance, you can refresh your turn unless you hit the end turn button. This type of functionality may help online gamers.
Bought to learn the game and some tactics for each faction before playing it with friends. Completely satisfied. Devs: your tutorial didn't include factory cards?!?! Add this!

Amazing to now also play on mobile. Especially useful when playing on the go. You get notifications when it's your turn, so you don't have to check the game regularly. Also the mobile UI seems a little more intuitive to me than on the pc. It has less space for errors (e.g. change your mind when choosing a mech, and similar sub menus) All in all, really nice, thanks guys :D
replyContent: Hey! Thank you for this great review :)

content: I've bought the steam version, and I decided to buy the android version to play with my friends from abroad. But the asynchronous mode is pathetic. We have to login at the same time to start the game. How is that asynchronous? I'm deleting and getting a refund. For solo mode, the app is great.
replyContent: Hello! We are sorry about that, the team took note of your review. They are working to improve the game and let players have the best experience on Scythe. Don't hesitate to send any suggestion or bug report to our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&contact=1

content: Is there a way add other level bots than easy level? I have only 'Bot easy +' button while setting up offline game.
replyContent: Hi! When you add an easy bot, touch the green mech icon, it will change the bot difficulty ;)

content: Such a beautiful digital version of the board game. It has a few bugs still but has worked without a problem. Practice against the computers or play with friends online. It's superb.

As an adaptation, it's great, but the multiplayer is too clunky. A friend and I bought it when we heard it had asychronous multiplayer, but you have to both be in the app at the same time, making it very clunky and kind of cancelling the appeal of not having to schedule time to play together. If you could invite a friend to start a game without having to be online at the same time, I'd change to 5 stars.

I love this app. I've recently bought the board game with the intention of mainly playing solo. I was on the fence about getting the digital version in case it made me not want to play the physical, but that hasn't been the case. The digital game helps with letting the rules sink in, and for a beginner like me it's ideal as it's very fun to play, while still wetting your appetite to play the board game.
Won't even install on my Pixel 4 XL
replyContent: Hello, we are sorry about that, could you share more information about this with our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&contact=1

content: Good, but now don't working on my phone :(
A nice mobile version of the base game. Hopefully the expansions will become available at some point.
replyContent: Thank you for the review!

content: Great

This app/game is awesome until it crashes. I've been playing online games for a week and those far 2 of the 3 games we were unable to finish when one of the players game locked up and couldn't end a move. It happened to me on Android and the other game it happened to my opponent on iOS. Both times the game could not be finished. Save your $8.99 until they fix this bug.
replyContent: Hello,  we are sorry that you encounter issues with the game, Could you please contact our support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/scythe-digital-edition/?p=all&contact=1

content: AI is unbeatable, on easy.
No tutorial hurts
Can't wait to add Invaders from Afar. The main frustration I have is not being able to join those games.
Bug: Can't view faction abilities during game. Press and hold just deselects the button instantly.

Was excited to play this on my Pixel Slate, after playing on Steam and the physical board game with all its expansions. But unfortunately it's unplayable, with severe flickering. I'm surprised there wasn't a warning from the Play Store about incompatibility. I guess I should have read the reviews, but I was excited at the prospect of playing it on a mobile device and I've never had an issue playing other games on this device (including Viticulture). Hope this issue gets resolved.
Failed to display some Chinese characters

I LOVE THIS APP! It's got a great offline mode to go bots against varying difficult or, what I didn't expect, to have the people play the different factions, you just have to pass the phone around. I haven't tried it yet since of course the quarantine, but it's a great way to play the board game, especially I don't own it yet. It's great to scratch the itch to play the game and experiment with different strategies as you get used with the game mechanics, especially the objectives
Love it! Great on the go experience. Any idea when the invaders from afar will be available??
Great implementation. I love the UI!
replyContent: Thank you ! :)

content: Love Scythe and have pretty much everything related to the game. Own the Steam version and it plays just fine. This version is GREAT on my Pixel 4XL however sadly it's unplayable on my Pixel Slate as it has severe flickering. I know it isn't designed for a Chromebook but please this game would be perfect on the Chromebooks!
Yes, please...now a Rise of Fenris!
great game design,bad flickering on Google slate

I love Scythe and this app certainly scratches the itch. No expansions yet, but I imagine that will come with time. Rise of Fenris would be a great addition for sure! The gameplay is smooth. The graphics are good. The interface is a bit tight, but with how much information they have to give you, it's really a great job. Great game. Love the app!
Finally! Been waiting so long for this :-D
Probably a great game. Wont let me get further than 27% installed.
Dude it's friggin Scythe on the phone!
Perfect port. May need some streamlining, but easy to navigate and clean graphics are spit on to the board game.
Great game!! But I didn't find how to know the opponent status!?!! For example I need to know the opponent power so then I can know when to attack!
INSTABUY! SUPER HAPPY! 1000Stars!
